pages.title: Alternative Lending Platform Software for MCA & ABL
pages.description: Launch your alternative lending platform faster. White-label software with underwriting automation, borrower onboarding, RBAC, Plaid, Stripe, and multi-tenant architecture for MCA and ABL funders.

pages.title: MCA Lending Software for Funders & ISOs | Lendgismo
pages.description: Merchant cash advance software with automated underwriting, collections, ISO portals, and compliance. Built for MCA funders and brokers. Launch faster with white-label tech.

pages.title: Asset-Based Lending (ABL) Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: ABL lending software with collateral tracking, borrowing base calculations, field audits, and compliance reporting. White-label platform for asset-based lenders.

pages.title: SMB Lending Platform for Small Business Lenders
pages.description: Launch SMB lending programs faster with white-label software. Digital onboarding, underwriting automation, loan servicing, and RBAC for small business lenders.

pages.title: White-Label Lending Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: Fully brandable lending platform with custom domains, themes, logos, and workflows. White-label software for lenders, ISOs, and fintech companies.

pages.title: Loan Origination System (LOS) for Alt Lenders
pages.description: Modern loan origination software for MCA, ABL, and working capital lenders. Automate intake, underwriting, decisioning, and funding with a flexible white-label LOS.

pages.title: Loan Management & Servicing Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: Manage loan servicing, collections, payments, and portfolio analytics. White-label loan management system for alternative lenders with ACH, reporting, and compliance.

pages.title: Underwriting Automation Software for Lenders
pages.description: Automate lending decisions with rules engines, scorecards, and cash-flow analysis. Underwriting software with Plaid, QuickBooks, and credit bureau integrations.

pages.title: Borrower Onboarding & Document Collection Software
pages.description: Digital onboarding for lenders with KYC, document upload, e-sign, and verification. Reduce friction and increase conversion with automated borrower intake.

pages.title: KYC, KYB & AML Compliance for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Automate KYC, KYB, and AML compliance with identity verification, business checks, and fraud screening. Compliance software for alternative lenders.

pages.title: Plaid Bank Data Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Integrate Plaid for instant bank verification, cash-flow analysis, and account monitoring. Pre-built Plaid integration for alternative lenders.

pages.title: QuickBooks Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Sync QuickBooks data for underwriting and portfolio monitoring. Automated financial analysis from P&L, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.

pages.title: Stripe Payments Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Process ACH and card payments with Stripe. Automated loan repayments, fee collections, and reconciliation for alternative lenders.

pages.title: Twilio SMS Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Send SMS notifications and OTP codes with Twilio. Two-factor authentication, payment reminders, and borrower messaging for lenders.

pages.title: SendGrid Email Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Send transactional emails with SendGrid. OTP codes, payment receipts, and borrower notifications with deliverability tracking.

pages.title: Multi-Tenant Lending Platform | Lendgismo
pages.description: Serve multiple lenders or brands from one platform. Multi-tenant architecture with data isolation, custom branding, and independent configurations per tenant.

pages.title: ISO & Broker Portal for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Empower ISO partners with branded portals for deal submission, tracking, and commission management. White-label broker portal with role-based access.

pages.title: Lending Decisioning Rules Engine | Lendgismo
pages.description: Configure credit policies with rules-based decisioning. Automate approval, decline, and manual review decisions with transparent logic and audit trails.

pages.title: Loan Pricing Engine for Alternative Lenders
pages.description: Standardize loan pricing with configurable fee structures, rate sheets, and margin calculations. Pricing software for MCA, ABL, and SMB lenders.

pages.title: Term Sheets & E-Signature for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Generate branded term sheets and loan agreements with e-signature workflows. DocuSign integration for fast loan closing and document management.

pages.title: Document Management for Lending | Lendgismo
pages.description: Centralized document storage, versioning, and access controls for loan files. Secure document management with audit trails and regulatory compliance.

pages.title: Collections & Payment Workflows | Lendgismo
pages.description: Automate collections with payment reminders, dunning sequences, and delinquency management. Collections software for alternative lenders.

pages.title: Portfolio Analytics & Reporting | Lendgismo
pages.description: Real-time portfolio analytics for loan performance, risk metrics, and investor reporting. Business intelligence dashboards for alternative lenders.

pages.title: Compliance & Audit Trail for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Maintain regulatory compliance with comprehensive audit trails, user activity logs, and data retention policies. SOC 2 compliant lending software.

pages.title: Lending API & Webhooks | Lendgismo
pages.description: RESTful API and webhook events for lending platform integration. Developer-friendly API for applications, decisioning, and loan servicing automation.

pages.title: Equipment Financing Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: Equipment finance origination and servicing software. Manage lease applications, asset tracking, and payment schedules for equipment lenders.

pages.title: Invoice Factoring Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: Invoice factoring and accounts receivable financing software. Manage invoice purchases, advance rates, and client/debtor relationships.

pages.title: Working Capital Lending Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: Working capital loan origination and servicing software. Revenue-based financing, cash flow loans, and line of credit management for SMBs.

pages.title: Ecommerce Lending Software | Lendgismo
pages.description: Lending software for ecommerce businesses. Integrate with Shopify, Amazon, and payment processors for revenue-based financing and inventory loans.

pages.title: MCA Software for Merchant Cash Advance Funders
pages.description: Complete MCA origination and servicing platform for merchant cash advance funders. Manage ISO networks, daily ACH collections, and factor rate pricing.

pages.title: Software for ISO Brokers & Merchant Cash Advance Brokers
pages.description: ISO broker portal for submitting MCA deals, tracking commissions, and managing merchant relationships. White-label broker software.

pages.title: Software for Nonbank Lenders & Alternative Lenders
pages.description: Complete lending platform for nonbank lenders, fintech companies, and alternative finance providers. Origination, underwriting, servicing, and compliance.

pages.title: SMB Lending Software for Credit Unions
pages.description: Small business lending platform for credit unions. Member business lending with SBA loan processing, underwriting automation, and portfolio management.

pages.title: SMB Lending Software for Community Banks
pages.description: Small business lending platform for community banks. Commercial lending origination, underwriting, and portfolio management for local banks.

pages.title: Fraud Detection, KYC & AML for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Prevent fraud with identity verification, KYC/KYB checks, AML screening, and device fingerprinting. Fraud detection software for alternative lenders.

pages.title: Cash Flow Analysis for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Analyze borrower cash flow with bank account data from Plaid. Automate revenue verification, expense categorization, and repayment capacity calculations.

pages.title: Risk Scoring & Credit Models for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Build custom risk scorecards and credit models for alternative lending. Predictive analytics, machine learning, and portfolio segmentation.

pages.title: Investor Reporting for Lenders | Lendgismo
pages.description: Automated investor reporting for warehouse lenders, institutional investors, and portfolio buyers. Loan tape generation and covenant compliance tracking.
